rows.label: qst201205_msg0001
rows.name: Th-The mercenaries...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0002
rows.name:
Damn you! I won't let you lay a
single finger on my children!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0003
rows.name:
Wait, you're wrong! We came here
to apologize for the past!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0004
rows.name:
Lies! As if I could believe a
word from such violent Blades!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0005
rows.name: ...See? It was pointless.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0006
rows.name:
...Let's go home, Mikumari. There's
no erasing the sins we committed.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0007
rows.name: Wait, Seori! I haven't given up yet!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0008
rows.name:
If we leave now, you'll be seen
as a criminal forever, you know?

rows.label: qst201205_msg0009
rows.name: I can't let that happen!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0010
rows.name:
I'll make everyone understand that
we're different now... that you're
actually a kind person deep down!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0011
rows.name:
I'll make them understand,
no matter what!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0012
rows.name: Mikumari...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0013
rows.name: Sir, please listen!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0014
rows.name:
It's true we may have done
something terrible to you
and your friends...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0015
rows.name:
As newly-awakened Blades, we don't
have memories of that time...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0016
rows.name:
But we understand that our
sin can never be erased.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0017
rows.name:
But our new friends... they're
all such kind people...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0018
rows.name: They all think about us so seriously.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0019
rows.name:
That's why, for their sakes
too, I've decided to atone
for my past sins!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0021
rows.name: Please! Give us a chance!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0022
rows.name:
I don't know if it'll be enough, but
we'll do anything we can to help!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0023
rows.name: We'll clean, do laundry, anything!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0024
rows.name:
...Mikumari. Aren't you terrible
at cleaning and laundry?

rows.label: qst201205_msg0025
rows.name:
Eh?! Um... then... Then
Seori will do it!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0026
rows.name: Me?!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0027
rows.name: In that case, I'll, uh...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0028
rows.name:
I know! Guard duty, or monster
slaying! I'm good at that stuff!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0029
rows.name: Pfft... Hahaha!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0030
rows.name:
I see. It seems you two
really have changed.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0031
rows.name:
The Blades I remember were like
cold, heartless assassins.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0032
rows.name: I don't see a trace of that in you now.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0033
rows.name:
Looks like you found yourselves
a good Driver this time.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0034
rows.name: ...Then, you'll...?

rows.label: qst201205_msg0035
rows.name: Yeah. I understand how you feel.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0036
rows.name:
If you want to apologize
to the townspeople, I suppose
I could help you out.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0037
rows.name: Really?! Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0038
rows.name:
However... Given what happened, I think
most people would be anxious about
giving you any combat-related jobs.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0039
rows.name: Ugh... Then, can't I be of any use?

rows.label: qst201205_msg0040
rows.name:
No... We've got a harvest festival
coming up. It's tradition to hand
out sweets to the kids.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0041
rows.name:
The sweets are called Whelzaman
Cookies. How about you make
and distribute them?

rows.label: qst201205_msg0042
rows.name:
Don't you think it's the perfect job
for regaining everyone's trust?

rows.label: qst201205_msg0043
rows.name: Yes! I'll do my absolute best!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0044
rows.name:
...Mikumari. Do you know how
to make Whelzaman Cookies?

rows.label: qst201205_msg0045
rows.name:
Not a clue! But it'll be fine!
Spirit can overcome anything!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0046
rows.name: ...Honestly. All you have is spirit.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0047
rows.name:
I have an acquaintance, Raviant,
who's a head chef. You can ask
her how to make them.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0048
rows.name:
She's at the restaurant above the
square in Fons Maim's Commercial
District. I'll let her know you're coming.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0049
rows.name: Thank you!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0050
rows.name: ...That helps.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0051
rows.name:
Alright, Seori! Let's
go ask her right away!
